name: Rube Goldberg (MitcheZhouZhou)
description:
This is the Rube Goldberg machine that I designed. It starts off with a ball on a ramp that collides into a bunch of dominoes. These dominoes then fall and hit the top of a seesaw. The seesaw then launches the basketball into the hoop.

(was in a bit of a rush to get it done because I joined late... sorry if it isn't as long or complicated as some of the other submissions)
